I payed for this game about 6 years ago. Played for years very well and never got out of silver. Started playing again after a couple years, got 13 MVP's and 60 kills in 3 games and got ranked Silver 1. If you are new to this game don't even bother cos you can't get out of CSGO's terrible ranking system that has screwed me over the course of 6 years. Actually fuck this game.
